QuestData.Title: Free Your Mind, the Rest Follows
QuestData.Description: <Rio said that the draught would not remain effective for long.>$B$B<You'd better hurry into the hovel and administer it to as many Twilight Servitors as you can find.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with 8 Twilight Servitors to administer the draught and rescue them.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! Let's hope the damage wasn't permanent.$B$BJudging by the poor victims still in camp here, the Twilight's Hammer really messed with their heads.
